title: Gold
description: Standard currency used for various purchases.

title: Gold
description: Standard currency used for various purchases.

title: Reputation
description: Amount of reputation you have accumulated.

title: Health
description: The amount of damage an entity can sustain before being downed.

title: Power
description: The amount of damage an entity is capable of dealing.

title: Special Power
description: The amount of damage an entity can deal with special attacks.

title: Armor
description: The damage resistance an entity possesses.

title: Critical Chance
description: The chance an entity will deal bonus damage on attack.

title: Dodge
description: The chance an entity will avoid an attack.

title: Clear Saved Game Data
description: Permanently delete your current saved game data. This action is irreversible.

title: Import Game Data
description: Export your current game data for sharing or importing at a later time.

title: Export Game Data
description: Import your own previously exported data or shared game data.

title: Save or Load from Cloud
description: Save or load your game data from the Cloud using Playfab.

title: Settings
description: Change your game preferences and settings.

title: Development Options
description: Development and debugging options for testing various mechanics, environments and features.
